Skydio | Redwood City, CA | ONSITE | iOS / Web

We are building autonomous drones.

Here is a cool drone's-eye view of following a person with full obstacle avoidance and predictive tracking https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WL9GpR_QnVM (this really works)

Here is an article about us in MIT Tech Review https://www.technologyreview.com/s/600925/daredevil-drone-fl...

Here is a talk by Adam, our CEO, on motion planning https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P3E4pl2Weos

We have a great team of roboticists working on advanced perception and planning algorithms, but I am looking for an iOS engineer help change the paradigm for drone interfaces: How would you design a camera app if your camera knew what it was filming and could fly?

If you are passionate about mobile design and want to get into robotics, drop me a line.

http://www.skydio.com/jobs/
